entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:25 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -42.9°C
Wind: NNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 44. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Ice fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
